text:
Anthony Dean Rodham (August 8, 1954 – June 7, 2019) was an American consultant and businessman. He was the youngest brother of Hillary Rodham Clinton, and the brother-in-law of former U.S. President Bill Clinton.
During the Hillary Clinton presidential campaign, 2016, he and Hugh appeared with her at a rally in their childhood summer home of Scranton, Pennsylvania in April 2016. He kept a low profile during the campaign.
Rodham died on June 7, 2019 at the age of 64.
